title: LOL Client does not start

embed.description: lolclient.exe keeps trying to start the ux renderer and fails.

body:
So I double clicked my desktop icon to launch League of Legends after the last patch and.. 
LeagueClient.exe keeps trying to start LeagueClientUx.exe and LeagueClientUxRender.exe 
but these programs repeatedly crash even under different PID's.

Attached is a video of the problem. The splash loads correctly, but the client doesn't load
[Attached Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WUN8nz3eJlk)

The LeagueClient Log file is here:
[2017-03-17T07-11-28_7236_LeagueClientUx.log](http://pastebin.com/4y78ASNW)


System Specs:
Lenovo Y500p
Intel Core i7-3630QM 8-core HT @2.4-3.2Ghz
2x 2048MB NVIDIA GT-650M SLI 386cores @835Mhz Driver: 21.21.13.7878
ADATA SP550 SSD @550 MB/s
8GB Samsung DDR3 RAM @1600Mhz
Intel(R) Centrino(R) Wireless-N 2230
Using LAN: Qualcomm Atheros AR8161 PCI-E Gigabit Ethernet Controller (NDIS 6.30)


Software:
Windows 10 Pro 64-bit (10.0, Build 14393)
NVIDIA 3D Vision Driver 378.78
NVIDIA PhysX 9.16.0318
Adobe AIR 25.0.0.134
Adobe Shockwave 12.2.8.198
Microsoft VIsual C++ 2017 Redistributable x64 - 14.10.24728
Microsoft VIsual C++ 2017 Redistributable x86 - 14.10.24728

replies.body: I'm currently having the same issue with my lol client. It takes forever to log me into the game. This sucks

same thing happening to me since yesterday.  if i try and open league it shows the logo for about 2 seconds then crashes.  however, if i run as administrator it opens and i get a message saying "we have reverted the client to a previous version and will now update the files" or something along those lines.  nothing downloads and i can log in.

op try running as administrator see if that works.
Hey, I uninstalled and reinstalled the game. Looks like I have to do this everytime this bug occurs.

> [{quoted}](name=BladeSlasher,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=3ioeMH9b,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-03-18T01:45:19.906+0000)
>
> Hey, I uninstalled and reinstalled the game. Looks like I have to do this everytime this bug occurs.

i tried that and it didnt fix it.  only thing that lets me in is running as admin.  strange.
